title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Yuzen dyed cotton
Medium: cotton
Technique:  dyed, painted and stenciled, using resist outlining; plain weave foundation
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 80 x 87.9 cm (31 1/2 x 34 5/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Elizabeth B. Willis
description: Still-life of flowers and pottery set in ocean waves. In soft greens, reds, browns, white, yellow on dark blue ground. Large circular family crest (Mon) in lower right. Made up of two breadths and narrow center panel. Corners accented by hand-stitching.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.
19th century. Yuzen dyed cotton
Medium: cotton
Technique:  dyed, painted and stenciled, using resist outlining; plain weave foundation. Gift of Mrs. Elizabeth B. Willis. 1954-123-1.
